message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_NAME_BLANK
message.locale: The name must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_CREATEPAGE_BLANK
message.locale: The create page must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_CREATEPAGEPLANITEMIDPARAM_BLANK
message.locale: The create page plan item ID parameter must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_CREATEPAGESUBGOALIDPARAM_BLANK
message.locale: The create page sub goal ID parameter must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_VIEWPAGE_BLANK
message.locale: The view page must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_MODIFYPAGE_BLANK
message.locale: The modify page must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_VIEWPAGEPLANITEMPARAM_BLANK
message.locale: The view page parameter must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_MODIFYPAGEPLANITEMPARAM_BLANK
message.locale: The modify page parameter must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_TYPECODE_BLANK
message.locale: Plan Item type code must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This plan item has already been cancelled.
This plan item has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELED
message.locale: This plan item is cancelled and cannot be modified.
This plan item is canceled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A plan item with the name specified already exists. Plan Item name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_REFERENCE_EXISTS
message.locale: A plan item with the reference specified already exists. Plan Item reference must be unique.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_CONTRACTTEXT_EXISTS_FOR_LANGUAGE
message.locale: Contract text already exists for this language.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_OUTCOME_EXISTS
message.locale: The outcome %1s has already been added to this plan item.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_GOOD_CAUSE_EXISTS
message.locale: The good cause %1s has already been added to this plan item.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_TEMPLATES_EXIST
message.locale: The plan item cannot be canceled as there are existing templates based on it.
The plan item cannot be cancelled as there are existing templates based on it.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_SUBGOAL
message.locale: This plan item is assigned to at least one sub goal and cannot be cancelled.
This plan item is assigned to at least one sub goal and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_APPROVALSID_EXISTS
message.locale: A plan item with the specified Approval SID already exists.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_APPROVALSID_NO_APPROVALREQUIRED
message.locale: This plan item does not require approval and does not therefore need an Approval security identifier.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_APPROVALREQUIRED_NO_APPROVALSID
message.locale: This plan item requires approval and an Approval security identifier should be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_GREATER_THAN_MAXIMUM_UNITS
message.locale: The Authorized Units cannot be greater than the Maximum Units.
The Authorised Units cannot be greater than the Maximum Units.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_NO_UNIT_TYPE_SELECTED
message.locale: Authorized Units cannot be entered as a Unit Type was not selected for this Plan Item.
Authorised Units cannot be entered as a Unit Type was not selected for this Plan Item.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_MAXIMUM_UNITS_NO_UNIT_TYPE_SELECTED
message.locale: Maximum Units cannot be entered as a Unit Type was not selected for this Plan Item.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_LE_ZERO
message.locale: Authorized Units must be greater than zero.
Authorised Units must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_FV_MAXIMUM_UNITS_LE_ZERO
message.locale: Maximum Units must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_TEXT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_AS_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Contract Text cannot be added as this plan item is already cancelled.
The Contract Text cannot be added as this plan item is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_TEXT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_AS_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Contract Text cannot be modified as this plan item is already cancelled.
The Contract Text cannot be modified as this plan item is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_TEXT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_AS_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Contract Text cannot be deleted as this plan item is already cancelled.
The Contract Text cannot be deleted as this plan item is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_EXPECTED_OUTCOME_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_AS_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Expected Outcome cannot be added as this plan item is already cancelled.
The Expected Outcome cannot be added as this plan item is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_EXPECTED_OUTCOME_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED_AS_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Expected Outcome cannot be removed as this plan item is already cancelled.
The Expected Outcome cannot be removed as this plan item is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_GOOD_CAUSE_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_AS_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Good Cause cannot be added as this plan item is already cancelled.
The Good Cause cannot be added as this plan item is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_GOOD_CAUSE_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED_AS_PLAN_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Good Cause cannot be removed as this plan item is already cancelled.
The Good Cause cannot be removed as this plan item is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_TASK_CONFIG_PI_OWNER_AND_ASSIGNTO_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Both 'Assigned to Planned Item Owner' and 'Assign to' fields cannot be populated. Only one of them should be populated.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_TASK_CONFIG_PI_OWNER_OR_ASSIGNTO_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Both 'Assigned to Planned Item Owner' and 'Assign to' fields cannot be blank. Only one of them should be populated.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_TASK_WITH_SAME_NAME
message.locale: Task configuration with this name already exists.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CONFIGURATION_ASSOCIATED_WITH_PLAN_ITEM
message.locale: This task configuration cannot be deleted as it is associated with an active plan item.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CONFIGURATION_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This task configuration cannot be modified as it has been cancelled
This task configuration cannot be modified as it has been canceled.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CONFIGURATION_CANNOT_BE_CANCELED
message.locale: This task configuration cannot be cancelled as it is already cancelled
This task configuration cannot be canceled as it is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_APPROVAL_CRIERIA_FV_ACTIVE_PLAN_TEMPLATE_PLAN_ITEM_APPROVAL_CRITERIA
message.locale: This Plan Item Approval Criteria has active links to plan template plan item approval criteria so cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_COST_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The cost cannot have a negative value, the amount must be zero or more.
